snippet: Federal prosecutors are wise to pursue the path of corporate responsibility in their investigation of the West Virginia mine disaster.
abstract: Editorial lauds federal prosecutors for continuing to pursue the path of corporate responsibility in their investigation of 2010 West Virginia mine disaster; notes David Hughart, former executive of Massey Energy, has been accused of criminal conspiracy in hiding safety violations and tipping off mine supervisors to spot inspections.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors are wise to pursue the path of corporate responsibility in their investigation of the West Virginia mine disaster.

headline.main: Ultimate Culpability for a Mine Disaster
